## variograma

```{r}
library(gstat)
library(sp)

data("meuse")

variograma <- variogram(log(zinc + 1) ~ 1, data = meuse, locations = ~x+y)

```



## Modelo Exponencial 
```{r}
modelo_exp <- fit.variogram(variograma, model = vgm(psill = 1, model = "Exp", range = 900, nugget = 0.5))
plot(variograma, modelo_exp)
```


## Modelo Gausiano
```{r}
modelo_Gau <- fit.variogram(variograma, model = vgm(psill = 1, model = "Gau", range = 900, nugget = 0.5))
plot(variograma, modelo_Gau)
```


## Modelo Monomico
```{r}
modelo_Pow <- fit.variogram(variograma, model = vgm(psill = 1, model = "Pow", range = 1, nugget = 0.5))
plot(variograma, modelo_Pow)
```


## Modelo Pepita Pura

```{r}
modelo_PP <- fit.variogram(variograma, model = vgm(psill = 1, model = "Nug", range = 0, nugget = 0.5))
plot(variograma, modelo_PP)
```
